Name: assettocorsa
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install AssettoCorsa and run it.

game_id.Name: GAME_ID
game_id.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
(https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

steam-username.Name: Steam-Username
steam-username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

validateinstallation.Name: Validate Installation
validateinstallation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

steam-password.Name: Steam-Password
steam-password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

installstracker.Name: Install Stracker
installstracker.Description: Set to 'true' (without quotes) to install Stacker, otherwise leave blank (Please note that you can only Stacker or Assetto-Server-Manager, not both at the same time).

installassetto-server-manager.Name: Install Assetto-Server-Manager
installassetto-server-manager.Description: Set to 'true' (without quotes) to install Assetto-Server-Manager, otherwise leave blank (Please note that you can only Stacker or Assetto-Server-Manager, not both at the same time).

tcp3-stracker.Name: TCP3 - Stracker
tcp3-stracker.Description: Only needed if you installed Stacker (Webserver Address: http://[IPOFYOURSERVER]:50041).

tcp4-assetto-server-manager.Name: TCP4 - Assetto-Server-Manager
tcp4-assetto-server-manager.Description: Only needed if you installed Assetto-Server-Manager (Webserver Address: http://[IPOFYOURSERVER]:8771).
